nadine ...... wrote:
> Hi,
> can anyone explain for me please if the
> HttpUrlConnection is used to make a requests to the
> HTTP server, so why do we have to use httpunit?

You don't have to use it.

Libraries like HttpUnbit, jWebUnit and HtmlUnit provide two parts:

1. An HTTP client
2. An assertion library to examine web pages

HtmlUnit, for example, merely wraps the Jakarta HTTP client, but 
provides all those great HTML page-based assertions. That's its real value.
--
